description:
Non-material amendment of outline planning permission ref: P081704 dated 06/02/2009 for the: ‘Outline planning application showing 'layout', 'scale' and 'access' for the phased demolition and phased redevelopment of the Packington Estate allowing for the erection of part 1 to 8 storey buildings (some with basement level) to provide for 394 affordable dwellings comprising: 168x1; 111x2; 64x3; 34x4; 15x5 and 3x6 bedroom flats/maisonettes/houses (1315 habitable rooms), 301 market dwellings comprising: 170x1 and 125x2 bedroom flats /maisonettes and 6 x studio apartments (722 habitable rooms), 750sqm of shop and non-residential institution floorspace (A1 and D1 use), 290sqm community centre (D1 use) and an outdoor recreation facility of no less than 446sqm. Creation of  open space (hard and soft landscaped and play areas) of no less than 6,783sqm, semi-private open space of no less than 265sqm and private gardens of no less than 10,956sqm, new roads and a cycle path, no more than 238 car parking spaces and no less than 590 bicycle spaces.  (DEPARTURE FROM PLAN owing to the loss of 1952sqm of open space).’  The non-material amendments are: 
A]	amendment of conditions 31, 32, 33 and 39 to alter the timeframes for the submission of details and in the case of condition 39 to also alter the requirement for when the details are installed; and
B]	the creation of a new condition (condition 52) listing the approved drawing numbers.
